info.name: Steampunk theme
info.description:
Steampunk is life~ ^^

[UPD] I realised that I'm quite late in seeing the bugs or errors and I'm sorry about it, SO please, if the Steampunk theme doesn't working anymore and you are totally sure there is womething wrong, DM me on Eldarya.fr (I'm Hina, I'll accept your friend request quickly)

data.title: Génial ! Avec "Stylus" ce thème marche de nouveau, très contente car je l'aime beaucoup ♥
